featured_section.header_content:
A digital
solution for supporting children with autism.

faq_section.title: About
faq_section.description: Psycho√âducatif is a digital platform designed to support children with autism in their development journey through an individualized and interactive approach. It offers assessment tools, educational strategies and adapted activities to meet the specific needs of each child.

item1.question: What is the Psycho√âducatif platform?
item1.answer: The Psycho√âducatif platform is an interactive digital solution that helps children with autism progress in their development. It offers skills assessments, personalized activities and educational strategies adapted to each child's needs.

item2.question: How does it work?
item2.answer: The platform works through children's skills assessment tools, interactive activities, and real-time progress tracking. It allows educators and parents to support children with personalized plans.

item3.question: Why use Psycho√âducatif?
item3.answer: Psycho√âducatif is designed to offer a unique and interactive experience, allowing children with autism to progress at their own pace. The platform adapts to each child's specific needs and supports educators and parents with modern and easy-to-use tools.

explore_section.title: Explore Psychoeducational Themes

stress_management.title: Stress Management
stress_management.description: Techniques for managing and reducing stress

personal_growth.title: Personal Growth
personal_growth.description: Developing a better understanding of oneself and one's abilities

emotion_management.title: Emotion Management
emotion_management.description: Strategies to understand and manage emotions

emotional_intelligence.title: Emotional Intelligence
emotional_intelligence.description: Developing awareness and management of emotions

cognitive_behavioral_therapy.title: Cognitive Behavioral Therapy
cognitive_behavioral_therapy.description: Approaches to treat cognitive and behavioral disorders

play_therapy.title: Play Therapy
play_therapy.description: Using play in the therapeutic process

timeline_section.title: How it works in the psychoeducational framework

explore_themes.title: Explore Psychoeducational Themes
explore_themes.description: Browse a wide range of psychoeducational themes to better understand the needs of children, parents and professionals. Discover information on psychological development, behavioral strategies and emotional wellbeing.

track_progress.title: Track and Record Progress
track_progress.description: Track the child's emotional and cognitive progress. Record the evolution and get information on behavioral changes through continuous monitoring.

learn_strategies.title: Learn and Practice Strategies
learn_strategies.description: Read and learn from psychoeducational resources that provide practical strategies to support children with emotional and developmental needs. Benefit from personalized advice based on real-time assessments.

timeline_section.more_info: Would you like to know more?

evaluation.title: Accurate and personalized assessment
evaluation.description: Detailed monitoring based on recognized psycho-education criteria.

interactive_activities.title: Interactive and fun activities
interactive_activities.description: Engaging exercises to stimulate learning and social skills development.

support.title: Support for parents and professionals
support.description: A dedicated space to track progress and adapt interventions.

accessibility.title: Accessibility and ergonomics
accessibility.description: An intuitive interface designed for easy use by children and their caregivers.

evaluation_featured_section.header_content:
Assessment
is a key step in the psycho-educational support of children with autism. It helps understand their needs and skills to develop personalized plans.

strengths_and_weaknesses.title: Identify the child's strengths and weaknesses
strengths_and_weaknesses.description: Determine current skills in key areas such as communication, social interactions, motor skills, and adaptive behaviors.

specific_needs.title: Detect specific needs
specific_needs.description: Identify obstacles that limit the child's autonomy and development.

baseline.title: Establish a baseline
baseline.description: Provide accurate data that will be used to measure progress over time.

psychoeducatif.title: Psycho√âducatif
psychoeducatif.description:
Accessibility: Allows use by parents and professionals, without the need for specialized equipment.
Personalization: Tools adapt to each child's specific needs.
Efficiency: Time savings in data collection and analysis.
Continuous monitoring: Regular updates of assessments to adjust support strategies.

child_profile.title: Child profile creation
child_profile.description:
General information (name, age, diagnosis, etc.).
Selection of areas to assess according to specific needs.

interactive_tests.title: Interactive tests and questionnaires
interactive_tests.description:
Series of questions adapted to age and development level.
Fun activities to assess cognitive and social abilities.

real_time_observation.title: Real-time observation and monitoring
real_time_observation.description: Allow parents and professionals to record daily behavioral observations directly in the application.

detailed_report.title: Automatically generated detailed report
detailed_report.description:
Analysis of results in the form of graphs and tables.
Personalized recommendations based on results.

new_featured_section.header_content: For optimal support of children with autism, together!

why_application.title: Why this application?
why_application.description: We designed this application with a clear vision: to offer children with autism, their families, and professionals modern and personalized tools for optimal psycho-educational care.

facilitate_evaluation.title: Facilitate needs assessment
facilitate_evaluation.description: Identify children's cognitive, social and behavioral abilities through modern tools.

personalized_support.title: Strengthen personalized support
personalized_support.description: Receive educational recommendations adapted to each child's unique needs, based on assessment results.

family_involvement.title: Promote family involvement
family_involvement.description: Encourage parents to play an active role in assessing and tracking their child's progress.

improve_collaboration.title: Improve collaboration
improve_collaboration.description: Facilitate exchanges between professionals and parents for optimal coordination in care.

fully_adapted.title: 100% adapted
fully_adapted.description: Designed specifically to meet the unique needs of children with autism.

expert_collaboration.title: Created with experts
expert_collaboration.description: Developed in collaboration with professionals and families for optimal effectiveness.

accessible_everywhere.title: Accessible everywhere
accessible_everywhere.description: Usable at any time, wherever you are, thanks to its intuitive platform.

strategies_featured_section.header_content: Discover our approaches to support children with autism towards greater autonomy.

interactive_tools.title: Use of interactive tools
interactive_tools.description: Develop games and fun activities to stimulate cognitive, social and behavioral skills.

personalized_approach.title: Personalized approach
personalized_approach.description: Adapt educational strategies to each child's specific needs for optimal results.

family_involvement.title: Family involvement
family_involvement.description: Create a collaborative environment where parents actively participate in their child's development.

progress_tracking.title: Continuous progress tracking
progress_tracking.description: Provide tools to measure skills evolution and adjust goals accordingly.

signup_form.title: Create an account
signup_form.subtitle: Fill in the fields to create a new account
signup_form.terms_checkbox: I accept the terms and conditions
signup_form.terms_content:
1. Acceptance of Terms

By using this service, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions of use.

2. Use of Service

You agree to use this service in a lawful, appropriate manner and in compliance with applicable laws.

3. Privacy and Data Protection

Your personal data will be processed in accordance with our privacy policy. We are committed to protecting your information.

4. Intellectual Property

All content, texts, images, and features of this service are protected by copyright and intellectual property rights.

5. Limitation of Liability

We will not be liable for indirect damages, data loss, or harm resulting from the use of this service.
